addBeneficiary.notice: Add donation beneficiary - Make `beneficiaryAdr` someone to receive donations

donate.notice: Donate ether to an address corresponding to a beneficiary ID

removeBeneficiary.notice: Remove address from list of possible beneficiaries

donors.notice: Retrive donor at a specific donor ID

beneficiaries.notice: Retrive beneficiary at a specific beneficiary ID

donations.notice: Retrive donation at a specific donation ID
